name: Flow_Oracle-Exported Files V2
description: Flow for different Oracle exported files. Daily exported to the server.

section Section1;

  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"ITEM", type text}, {"description", type text}, {"Plannercode", type text}, {"Buyer", type text}, {"Sourcing commodity", type text}, {"Product Family", type text}, {"Product Line", type text}, {"Forecast Field", type text}, {"Org Product Family", type text}, {"Org Product Line", type text}, {"Org Forecast Field", type text}, {"Make/Buy Flag", type text}, {"Item Status", type text}, {"WIP Supply Type", type text}, {"SubInventory + Locator", type text}, {"Rev", type text}, {"UOM", type text}, {"User Item Type", type text}, {"Receipt Routing", type text}, {"Inventory Planning Method", type text}, {"MPS/MRP PLanning Method", type text}, {"Commodity Code", type text}, {"Wip Supply Subinv", type text}, {"Wip Supply Locator", type text}, {"Completion Subinv", type text}, {"Completion Locator", type text}, {"Receiv Default Subinv", type text}, {"Receiv Default Subinv 2", type text}, {"Receiv Default Locator", type text}, {"To Receiver", type text}, {"Source org or Vendor", type text}, {"Source type", type text}, {"Lot Control", type text}, {"Serial Number Control", type text}, {"UOM of Weight", type text}}),
  #"Changed column type with locale" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed column type", {{"Item Cost", type number}, {"Material Cost", type number}, {"Material Overhead Cost", type number}, {"Resource Cost", type number}, {"OSP Cost", type number}, {"Overheader Cost", type number}, {"Nettable Qty", type number}, {"Non Nettable Qty", type number}, {"Safety Stock", type number}}, "de-DE"),
  #"Changed column type with locale 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed column type with locale", {{"Lead Time", type number}, {"Fixed Lot Multiplier", type number}, {"Fixed Order Quantity", type number}, {"Fixed Days Supply", type number}, {"Minimum Order Qty", type number}, {"Maximum Order Qty", type number}, {"Min MinMax Quantity", type number}, {"Max MinMax Quantity", type number}, {"Qty Rcvd not Del", type number}, {"Processing Lead Time", type number}, {"Current Issues FY", type number}, {"Issues Last FY", type number}, {"Issues Last 12 Months", type number}, {"Issues Last 90 Days", type number}, {"Current Recipts FY", type number}, {"Receipts Last FY", type number}, {"Receipts Last 12 Months", type number}, {"Receipts Last 90 Days", type number}, {"CC Adj Last 12 Months", type number}, {"Qty on Order", type number}, {"Gross Requirements", type number}, {"Gross requirements days 0 - 30", type number}, {"Gross requirements days 30 - 60", type number}, {"Gross requirements days 60 - 90", type number}, {"Gross requirements days 90 - 180", type number}, {"Gross requirements days 180 - 360", type number}, {"Release Time Fence", type text}, {"By-Products", type number}, {"By-Products days 0 - 30", type number}, {"By-Products days 30 - 60", type number}, {"By-Products days 60 - 90", type number}, {"By-Products days 90 - 180", type number}, {"By-Products days 180 - 360", type number}, {"APOP (Average PO Price Paid)", type number}, {"Acceptable Early Days", type number}, {"Unit Weight", type number}, {"Cumulative Total Lead Time", type number}, {"Last Update Date", type date}, {"Creation Date", type date}, {"Last Receipt Date", type date}, {"Last Issue Date", type date}}, "de-DE"),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Changed column type with locale 1", {{"ITEM", "Item"}, {"description", "Item Description"}, {"Current Issues FY", "Current Issued FY"}, {"Issues Last FY", "Issued Last FY"}, {"Issues Last 12 Months", "Issued Last 12 Months"}, {"Issues Last 90 Days", "Issued Last 90 Days"}}),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Renamed columns", "Stock Value", each [Item Cost] * [Nettable Qty]),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Added custom", {{"Stock Value", Currency.Type}}),
  #"Added custom 1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed column type 1", "Refurb", each Text.Contains([Item], "R")),
  #"Changed column type 2" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Added custom 1", {{"Refurb", type logical}})
in
  #"Changed column type 2";
